# Using `read` functions to load SS3 results


```{r loadpkg}
library(ss3om)
```

```{r setpwd}
dir <- system.file("ext-data/herring", package="ss3om")
```

## *FLStock*

```{r readfls}
simp324 <- readFLSss3(dir, name="herring")
```
